body:
I was playing siege map, which is a great map but we all spawned in a desert biome and then all spawned underground and all died.

This map needs to be fixed or remove it
body_tagged:

title: Siege map ERROR

replies.body:
If you want to report this as a bug, use GitHub.

https://github.com/Avicus/Issues/issues

Ivy or a Map Dev will take a look at it

replies.body: Thanks for telling us, temporary issues are posted here, not on GitHub, probably, Ivy will try to fix it ASAP.
replies.body_tagged: Thanks for telling us, temporary issues are posted here, not on GitHub, probably, Ivy will try to fix it ASAP.

replies.body: AFAIK They know about this and the map should be getting removed from rotations when the servers restart. At least thats what I was told by ParaSpider (not exactly that but something along those lines)
